          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Time Expressions</string>
            <string language="en">Time Expressions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit-Ausdrücke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressions de Temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expressões Do Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espressioni Di Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονικές εκφράσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Expresiones Del Tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Practise the use of some time expression by putting them into the right context.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
            <string language="en">Practice the use of some time expression by putting them into the right context. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">time expressions</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">time expressions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Üben Sie den Gebrauch von irgendeinem 
Zeitausdruck, indem Sie sie in den rechten Kontext setzen. Safir
- Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 3 - wie geht es 
Ihnen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratiquez l'utilisation d'une certaine expression
de temps en les mettant dans le bon contexte. Safir - l'anglais 
et vie active pour des débutants - module 3 - comment allez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pratique o uso de alguma expressão do tempo pondo
os no contexto direito. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 3 - como é você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitisi nell'uso di una certa espressione di 
tempo mettendole nel giusto contesto. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 3 - come siete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρακτική η χρήση κάποιας χρονικής έκφρασης με την 
τοποθέτηση τους στο σωστό πλαίσιο. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 3 - πώς 
είστε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Practique el uso de una cierta expresión del 
tiempo poniéndolas en el contexto idóneo. ¿Safir - inglés y 
vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 3 - cómo es usted?</string>
          </description>
